channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Could David Tennant Return to the MCU?
item.description: Plus, new 'Highlander' reboot set pictures reveal Dave Bautista's Kurgan.

item.title: Romeo is a Dead Man is bizarre, bloody, and exactly what makes Grasshopper special
item.description: A postmodern surrealist tale of geopolitics. An otaku's hellbent journey to become the top-ranked assassin. A high school cheerleader who kills zombies with a chainsaw and pompoms, with a story co-written by James Gunn. Every project under the Grasshopper Manufacture umbrella sounds like an unlikely anecdote. The Japanese video game studio founded in 1998 by […]...

item.title: Hauler Hero collects $16M for its AI waste management software
item.description: Hauler Hero has seen its customer base, revenue, and head count double since the company raised its seed round in 2024.

item.title: Workday CEO Eschenbach steps down – co-founder Bhusri to return
item.description: Workday's co-founder is returning to lead the company after Eschenbach steps down following two-year tenure.

item.title: The Until Dawn developer's next game, Directive 8020, just got a release date at long last
item.description: A new Directive 8020 trailer has arrived, with the survival horror game now available to pre-order.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Wednesday, February 11 (game #976)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Wednesday, February 11 (game #1479)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Wednesday, February 11 (game #710)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: OnlyFans : une nouvelle loi veut faire tomber les « proxénètes 2.0 »
item.description: Une nouvelle proposition de loi, examinée ce mardi 10 février au Sénat, veut s'attaquer aux « proxénètes 2.0 » qui contraignent des « modèles » à publier du contenu pornographique sur des plateformes en ligne comme OnlyFans ou Mym.

item.title: India orders social media platforms to take down deepfakes faster
item.description: India’s new rules take effect February 20, tightening deepfake oversight and shrinking takedown windows to as little as two hours.

item.title: Save $200 on Creality's 'exceptional' beginner 3D printer - Hi Combo is just $399 with multi-color printing and fast 500mm/s speeds
item.description: Creality’s Hi Combo is now $200 off, down to $399 for a fast, beginner-friendly 3D printer with multi-color support, auto-calibration, and near plug-and-play setup.

item.title: La version 1 To de la Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra connaît une importante réduction sur Amazon
item.description: La Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra est l'une des meilleures tablettes du moment grâce à son écran Amoled hyper réactif, idéal pour profiter à fond du stylet fourni avec la tablette. La version proposée ici se démarque avec une capacité de stockage d'1 To et perd 300 euros chez Amazon.

item.title: Autodesk is suing Google over the name of its Flow AI videomaker
item.description: Autodesk, a company known for its suite of 3D design software, is suing Google over claims that it infringed on its "Flow" trademark, as reported earlier by Reuters. The lawsuit, filed in a California court last week, alleges that the name of Google's AI video generator, Flow, will likely confuse customers with Autodesk's own AI-enabled […]

item.title: 58% of Brits faced significant online risk in 2025 – increased AI usage is reducing digital trust
item.description: Fraud and cyberbullying seem to be the biggest issues that risk blocking youth from access to valuable technology.

item.title: BYD : ce nouveau SUV électrique à prix cassé veut faire de l’ombre au Tesla Model Y
item.description: BYD vient de dévoiler une nouvelle voiture électrique : le Song Ultra. D'une longueur équivalente à celle d'un Tesla Model Y, ce SUV arrive dans un contexte tumultueux pour le géant chinois.

item.title: Proton VPN’s new Android update fixes the one thing we hate about ‘Quick Connect’
item.description: Proton VPN's Android users can now exclude specific cities and countries from its "Quick Connect" and "Random" server selection. Here is how to use it and why it is a win for privacy die-hards.

item.title: How to watch Jordan Stolz at Winter Olympics 2026: Free Speed Skating Streams, TV Channels
item.description: All the ways to watch Jordan Stolz live streams for FREE, as the speed skater looks to win numerous medals at the Winter Olympics 2026.

item.title: Scientists Say We Might Have 33 Senses. Here’s the Breakdown
item.description: Think you have just five senses? The true number could be much higher.

item.title: Former GitHub CEO raises record $60M dev tool seed round at $300M valuation
item.description: Thomas Dohmke's new startup offers an AI system to allow developers to better manage all the code AI agents produce.

item.title: The 5 best films we saw at Sundance 2026
item.description: Whether you want something funny, dark, inspiring, or deeply weird from Sundance 2026, we've got a pick for you.

item.title: Ayaneo Next 2 : jusqu’où peut grimper le prix d’une console portable ?
item.description: Jusqu'où les prix des consoles portables peuvent aller trop loin ? Le constructeur Ayaneo teste les limites extrêmes des portefeuilles des joueurs avec la Next 2, qui coûtera la bagatelle de… 4 299 $. Si les amateurs s'y prennent suffisamment tôt, ce prix tombe à 3 499 $ « seulement ».

item.title: Monks arrive in D.C. after their cross-country walk for peace. Here’s what they have planned next
item.description: A simple message of hope and peace has made months-long internet celebrities out of a group of Buddhist monks and their rescue dog, Aloka. Shortly after 7:00 local time this morning, the internet-famous walk for peace monks began the final miles of their 2,300-mile walking journey.

item.title: Waymos robotaxis go driverless in Nashville
item.description: Waymo has removed safety drivers from its robotaxis in Nashville, signalling that it's getting ready to launch in the city soon.

item.title: BYD améliore grandement son Atto 3 sans toucher au prix : voici les améliorations du SUV électrique
item.description: Surprise : BYD vient d'apporter une mise à jour majeure à son SUV électrique rival du Renault Scénic E-Tech. Dorénavant baptisé BYD Atto 3 Evo, il gagne en vitesse de chargement et en autonomie, tout en conservant un tarif bien placé.

item.title: Salesforce halts development of new features for Heroku cloud AI platform
item.description: Heroku has gone into a 'sustaining engineering' phase, which means Salesforce won't be updating it with new features anymore.

item.title: Presidents' Day sales 2026: The best tech deals to shop early from Apple, Sony, Samsung and others
item.description: You can find a lot of good deals for Presidents’ Day, but to say it’s a tech-deal boon would be an overstatement. The best Presidents’ Day deals are usually on mattresses, appliances and furniture, but you can find some decent tech sales thrown in as well. This year, Presidents’ Day comes right after Valentine’s Day and Super Bowl 2026, which means there are even more chances to save as sales and discounts overlap. If you’re looking for a new streaming device, a fresh iPad or an upgraded vacuum so you can enter the spring-cleaning season properly, we have you covered. These are the best Presid...

item.title: Refreshing your home audio setup? From Sonos to Bose, I’ve tested each and every wireless speaker here, and rounded up my faves for superb sound and features in spades
item.description: I test wireless speakers for a living – and based on my hands-on experience, these offer the kind of superb sound and fantastic features you won’t want to miss

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26 Ultra : une fuite dévoile la fiche technique complète
item.description: À quelques semaines du lancement des Galaxy S26, les prochains fleurons de Samsung, une fuite dévoile la fiche technique du smartphone.

item.title: Set Sail With the Newest ‘One Piece’ Season 2 Trailer
item.description: Netflix has 'One Piece' trailers for days, and the newest wants you to know you're in for a fun time with your pirate friends.

item.title: How Many Times Do You Fart a Day? ‘Smart Underwear’ Says It’s Way More Than You Think
item.description: The device brings the study of farts “into the 21st century,” the researchers say.

item.title: Nintendo keeps filling in the gaps
item.description: When you buy a new Nintendo device, there are a few things you can expect: namely, some excellent Super Mario, Pokémon, and Legend of Zelda games, and maybe a great Animal Crossing, Mario Kart, or Smash Bros. The question mark has always been the other stuff. But with the Switch 2, it doesn't seem like […]

item.title: Primary Ventures raises healthy $625M Fund V to focus on seed investing
item.description: Primary Ventures has closed a $625 million fund focused on seed investing nationwide. It's a sizeable accomplishment for a seed-stage VC firm.

item.title: Proptech startup Smart Bricks raises $5 million pre-seed led by a16z
item.description: Smart Bricks is an AI-powered proptech that helps investors find high-quality real estate investments

item.title: AI video startup Runway raises $315M at $5.3B valuation, eyes more capable world models
item.description: Startup Runway has raised a $315 million round at a $5.3 billion valuation, funds it will use to expand beyond AI video generation and into world models.

item.title: Mario Tennis Fever is a fun and wacky tennis game, if not quite a Switch 2 exclusive smash
item.description: Mario Tennis Fever injects its fun arcade sports gameplay with Mario Kart-style antics, with a variety of content to unlock and mayhem to master, even if its Adventure mode could have been more substantial.

item.title: Romeo is a Dead Man is a hyper-violent sci-fi trip that’s as gripping as it is mystifying
item.description: Romeo is a Dead Man is not perfect, but it is one of the most fascinating action games of recent years.

item.title: ASUS Zenbook Duo (2026) review: Two screens really are better than one
item.description: It takes time for novel designs to catch on. But even so, I am still wondering why the Zenbook Duo hasn't had a bigger impact on the market after ASUS released its first true dual-screen laptop two years ago. Notebooks like these provide the kind of screen space you'd typically only get from a dual monitor setup, but in a much more compact form factor that you can easily take on the road. It could be that people were wary of an unfamiliar design, shorter battery life or buying a first-gen product — all of which are understandable concerns. However, now that ASUS has given the ZenBook Duo a tot...

item.title: Mario Tennis Fever takes Mario sports back to arcade basics in the best way
item.description: 'Mario Sports Fever' drops the fighting game sweatiness of the previous game in the series in favor of something anyone can enjoy.

item.title: Spectrum’s Invincible WiFi Ensures You’re Always Connected—No Matter What
item.description: Even when your power goes down, your Wi-Fi won't.

item.title: Rumor suggests Intel's next-gen flagship CPU could eat your PC's power supply for breakfast — but don't panic yet
item.description: Intel's Nova Lake flagship is rumored to have eye-opening power usage — but I don't think this is anything to worry about (yet).

item.title: New Gallup pole shows Americans’ optimism has sunken to a new low
item.description: Hispanics and Democrats were particularly pessimistic in 2025. Americans’ hope for their future has fallen to a new low, according to new polling.In 2025, only about 59% of Americans gave high ratings when asked to evaluate how good their life will be in about five years, the lowest annual measure since Gallup began asking this question almost 20 years ago.It’s a warning about the depth of the gloom that has fallen over the country over the past few years. In the data, Gallup’s “current” and “future” lines have tended to move together over time — when Americans are feeling good about the prese...

item.title: A modder has created a Witcher 4 prequel quest starring Ciri before The Witcher 4 has even released — but you might have some trouble running it
item.description: A modder has released a new Witcher 3 questline that acts as a prelude to The Witcher 4 and stars Ciri, and it took them approximately 800 hours to create.

item.title: When machines remember us: Rethinking privacy in the age of humanoids
item.description: As humanoid robots enter daily life, privacy shifts from policy promises to architectural design.

item.title: Disney+ and Hulu deal: Get one month of the bundle for $10
item.description: The peak time for deals on streaming services — the holiday shopping season — has come and gone, but Disney is back with a fresh offer for the new year. New and eligible returning subscribers can get one month of the ad-supported Disney+ Hulu bundle for just $10. That's $3 off the usual monthly rate for the bundle, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the prices for each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't quite as good as the Black Friday deal we saw last year, which offered th...

item.title: Windows 11 : une mise à jour surprise promet de booster les performances de votre PC
item.description: Une nouvelle mise à jour de Windows 11 vient d'être déployée pour les membres Windows Insiders. Au programme : nouveaux émojis, paramètres caméra et améliorations des performances.

item.title: Cette souris Razer est plus chère qu’une voiture d’occasion
item.description: Razer vient de dévoiler le prix de sa souris collector, la Boomslang, une édition limitée de son première modèle gaming sorti en 1999. Et il faudra mettre un salaire de côté pour se la procurer.

item.title: Atlantic.net review
item.description: Atlantic.net offers an excellent range of unmanaged hosting plans, with the option to add-on expert managed services.

item.title: Mars : les données de ce rover de la Nasa ne laissent plus qu’une explication possible
item.description: Des composés organiques ont été découverts sur Mars avec une question : sont-ils l'œuvre d'une forme de vie ancienne ? Selon de nouveaux travaux, un processus abiotique ne serait pas suffisant pour expliquer les caractéristiques de cet échantillon.

item.title: Save over $300 on the Hisense 55-Inch Class QLED 4K S7N CanvasTV at Amazon
item.description: As of Feb. 10, the Hisense 55-Inch Class QLED 4K S7N CanvasTV is on sale at Amazon for $693.99, 31% off its list price of $999.99.

item.title: Could the Trump Phone be a good phone?
item.description: We have long had our doubts about the Trump Phone. Since its very first debut, the device - technically called the Trump Mobile T1 Phone 8002 - has seemed utterly impossible to execute as advertised. The Trump Mobile team has also spent the last eight months rapidly moving the goalposts, changing specs and making increasingly […]

item.title: Boutiques d’apps : Londres choisit la manière douce contre Apple et Google
item.description: Plutôt que d'imposer des changements comme l'exige régulièrement l'Union européenne, le Royaume-Uni a préféré s'entendre avec Apple et Google pour l'ouverture de leurs boutiques d'applications à une meilleure concurrence. Les deux entreprises se sont ainsi engagées à améliorer la transparence, l'équité et la lisibilité des règles de l'App Store et du Play Store. Des promesses qui ne mangent pas de pain et qui ne devraient pas trop bousculer les contrôleurs d'accès....

item.title: Bluesky rattrape X avec l’arrivée des brouillons
item.description: Bluesky continue de s’imposer comme une alternative solide à X (Twitter). La nouvelle version de l’application introduit une fonctionnalité attendue de longue date par ses utilisateurs.

item.title: Avec ce boitier HDMI et cette bande lumineuse Philips Hue, vous pouvez créer un Ambilight maison à moins de 400 €
item.description: Si vous n'avez pas de TV Ambilight chez vous, ne désespérez pas. Vous pouvez tout à fait recréer ces effets lumineux grâce à deux produits : un boîtier HDMI Philips Hue Play HDMI Sync Box 8K et une bande lumineuse Philips Hue Gradient Lightstrip. Le tout est proposé dans un pack à 359,99 euros au lieu de 546,98 euros par la Fnac.

item.title: How to watch Pakistan vs. USA online for free
item.description: How to watch T20 World Cup for free. Live stream Pakistan vs. USA in the 2026 T20 World Cup for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Our favorite Sony wireless headphones are on sale for a record low
item.description:
Sony's wireless WH-1000XM6 headphones are on sale for $398 via Amazon. This is a record-low price, as it drops $62 from the price tag. The sale applies to all three colorways. These easily topped our list of the best wireless headphones. They are, in a word, fantastic. The headphones are packed with premium features, like advanced ANC. There are a whopping 12 ANC microphones throughout and a brand-new chip to power the feature. The end result? It successfully blocks background noise at medium and high frequencies, including the human voice.
The sound quality is extremely pleasing to the ear...

item.title: Trek lance ses Charter+ : des vélos électriques ultra polyvalents à partir de 3 000 euros
item.description: Trek dévoile Charter+, une nouvelle gamme de vélos électriques haut de gamme. Composée de 18 nouveaux modèles, elle mise sur le confort et la connectivité avec comme promesse de faciliter aussi bien les déplacements du quotidien que les sorties plus sportives.

item.title: ‘That makes no sense to me at all’: Jony Ive rejects Tesla-style 'giant iPads' and reveals button-heavy Ferrari Luce cockpit
item.description: Ferrari has revealed some of the interior of its Luce EV, while designer Jony Ive takes a swipe at touchscreens.

item.title: UK takes 'light touch' approach to regulating Apple and Google's app stores
item.description: Last year the UK declared that Apple and Google were a duopoly with "strategic market status" in the mobile platforms market, making them subject to special regulations. However, the UK's Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) will not regulate Google and Apple's app stores like the EU has done. Rather, government plans to enforce its own digital markets rules in a "pragmatic" way by accepting "commitments" from Apple and Google in areas like app rankings, the CMA announced. Google and Apple agreed to work with the CMA to address concerns on the following matters: app review, app ranking, us...

item.title: New Deep-Sea Mollusk Has an Iron Tongue and Hitchhiking Worms That Eat Its Poo
item.description: Meet Ferreiraella populi, a weird mollusk discovered in Japan. Keep reading to find out how Rihanna is involved.

item.title: Siri’s new Gemini-powered brain is almost here – find out how to try it in iOS 26.4 this month
item.description: The first stages of Siri's AI overhaul should arrive with iOS 26.4, and the first beta of that is reportedly just weeks away.

item.title: I’ve watched the Virgin River season 7 trailer more times than I can count — and one unexpected storyline already feels like rage bait
item.description: Netflix has dropped the first Virgin River season 7 trailer and it’s total rage bait, with every storyline first-look is more infuriating than the last.

item.title: Toyota and Pony.ai start mass producing robotaxis for China
item.description: The first Pony.ai bZ4X robotaxi, made in partnership with Toyota, has just rolled off the production line and is ready to be deployed. It’s the first of many, if the companies stick to their plan, which is to produce more than 1,000 bZ4X robotaxis this year. The bZ4X is one of the three autonomous vehicle models Pony.ai intends to use for commercial services in Tier 1 Chinese cities, including Beijing and Shanghai. The other two vehicles are already being used for Pony.ai’s ride-hailing service, while the bZ4X robotaxis will be gradually integrated into its fleet. Pony.ai’s goal is to operate...
